People

The CloudCoder lead developers are:

Jaime Spacco <jspacco@knox.edu>
Jaime is an Associate Professor at Knox College. He came up with the idea for CloudCoder at breakfast at SIGCSE 2010.
David Hovemeyer <dhovemey@ycp.edu>
Dave is an Associate Professor at York College of Pennsylvania. He has been programming since 1991, and suspects that he may be competent, although he's not sure whether or not CloudCoder lends credibility to this theory.

Contributors:

Andrei Papancea
Andrei worked on CloudCoder as an undergraduate student at Knox College and is currently a graduate student at Columbia University.
